faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about PriceWatch

q1.question: Is PriceWatch really free?
q1.answer: Yes, PriceWatch is completely free. You can track as many products as you want without any limitations.

q2.question: Which e-commerce sites are supported?
q2.answer: We currently support Amazon.fr, Fnac, Darty, Cdiscount, Boulanger and E.Leclerc. More sites will be added soon.

q3.question: How often are prices checked?
q3.answer: You can choose the check frequency for each product: hourly, every 6 hours, every 12 hours or daily.

q4.question: How does the alert system work?
q4.answer: You receive an automatic email as soon as a product's price reaches or falls below your target price. You can customize your notification preferences.

q5.question: Is my data secure?
q5.answer: Absolutely. We use standard security protocols (HTTPS, password encryption) and never share your data with third parties.

q6.question: Can I track an unlisted product?
q6.answer: If the product is on one of our supported sites, you can track it. Just copy the product page URL.
